Feeling overwhelmed with workload and questioning the relevance of some courses.

Starting to make friends, feeling a bit more settled in the college environment.

Encountering diverse personalities, leading to reflections on personal identity and belonging.

Organize a small gathering with classmates to foster friendships

long_term: Develop a supportive network of friends and professional contacts.
Cultivate meaningful, long-lasting relationships.
